about.title: About Us
description: Gulqand is a sweet preserve made from rose petals, a delicacy that has been cherished for centuries in traditional Indian and Persian cuisine. Our journey began with a passion for preserving this ancient art of making rose petal jam.

Each jar of our gulqand is crafted with carefully selected rose petals, processed using traditional methods that have been passed down through generations. We take pride in maintaining the authenticity while ensuring the highest quality standards.

Our commitment to quality begins with selecting the finest roses, harvested at dawn when their fragrance is at its peak. The petals are then processed with pure sugar using time-honored techniques to create this magical preserve.

benefits.title: Benefits of gulqand
benefits.intro: gulqand was first consumed in Ancient India and Persia (900 BC) for its rich taste, healing properties, and unique characteristics.

features.traditional_desc: Made with rose petals and sugar for 29 days.

list.title: Digestive System
list.text: gulqand reduces stomach acidity and helps treat ulcers.

list.title: Oral Health
list.text: gulqand strengthens teeth and gums, and can be used as a natural breath freshener.

list.title: Reproductive Health
list.text: gulqand is beneficial for both male and female reproductive health.

list.title: Detoxification
list.text: Cleanses the blood and removes toxins from the body.

list.title: Skin Health
list.text: Helps treat skin issues such as acne and boils.

list.title: Hyperhidrosis
list.text: Reduces excessive sweating and eliminates body odor.

list.title: Sun Protection
list.text: Reduces the risk of sunstroke in hot weather.

list.title: Urinary System
list.text: Regulates fluid balance in the body.

list.title: Nervous System
list.text: Has a calming effect and helps reduce stress.

list.title: Rejuvenation
list.text: With long-term use, it has a rejuvenating effect on the body.
